sentences.sContent: He telephoned me the latest news.
sentences.sCn: 他打电话告诉我最新的消息。

sentences.sContent: His latest novel was cut up by the reviewers.
sentences.sContent_eng: His latest novel was cut up by the reviewers.
sentences.sCn: 他的最新小说被评论家批得体无完肤。

sentences.sContent: In order to prove his point he showed them the latest sales figures.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to prove his point he showed them the latest sales figures.
sentences.sCn: 为了证明他的观点，他给他们看了最新的销售数字。

trans.tranOther: the most recent or newest thing

trans.tranCn: 最新的，最近的；最迟的，最后的
trans.tranOther: the most recent or the newest
